list.description_zh: 获取容器运行时日志列表(非容器内部服务日志)
list.description_en: Retrieve the list of container runtime logs (non container internal service logs)
list.command: docker info | grep -i "Docker Root Dir" | awk '{print $NF "/containers"}' | xargs -I {} find {} -type f -name "*.log" -exec sh -c 'log_path="{}"; cid=$(basename $(dirname "$log_path")); cname=$(docker inspect --format "{{.Name}}" "$cid" 2>/dev/null | sed "s/^\///"); [ -z "$cname" ] && cname="未知容器"; du -sh "$log_path" | awk -v cid="$cid" -v cname="$cname" "{print $0, " (容器ID: " cid ", 容器名称: " cname ")"}"' \;
